divs: Sighting Detailswe where in the car headed south on old route 64 at sun set when my mother and inoticed a object headed nw. the object had 2 flashing lights white and a scarletcolor.at first we thought it was a plane but as we turn right headed west itfollowed the car for about 4 miles and changed color to a bright scarlet color.as we turn north into my grand mothers driveway which was about 400 ft long itfollowed us and disapeared over the tree line.we staid at grand moms for about30 mins. and headed home we just got back to the hwy and turn east when when momyelled out there it is. it was hovering over some trees, look like a big football glowing a scarlet color mom puled of the road and just stared at it me atthe time i was scared to death and kept screaming for her to go but she just sitthere and about 15 in she drove of the object was there when we left we wenthome picked up dad and came back but it had gone.this is just 1 of many strange things that we saw while living in pearson ga.if u have any comments please contact me
